# Template Name: Classic ZX Spectrum
Description: A empty single file template

## Directories
- data

## Files

### {projectName}.bas
```nextbuild
' Project: {projectName}
' Type: Simple Empty ZX Spectrum Template
' Generated by NextBuild Project Creator

'!org=$8000

' Leave out the nextlib, but lets include a macro for break 
#include "nextlib.bas"

#include <print42.bas>


' Variables go here 
dim     x as ubyte = 0
dim     y as ubyte = 0

' Initialise here 
MainInit()

' Main loop
do 

    ' Wait for raster line 192
    Pause 0 

loop 

'----------------------------------------------------------
' Subroutines go here

sub MainInit()

    ' set border, paper, ink 
    border 1 : paper 1 : ink 6 : cls 

    ' print text 
    print42( "Welcome to {projectName}!" )

end sub 


```
